x_angle.name: Block Angle X
x_angle.information:
vertical block angle
0 to 180
All presets use 90°

max_time.name: Max Time
max_time.information:
The maximum amount of time you can hold up the shield (in ticks)
0 to 1200

cooldown.name: Cooldown
cooldown.information:
The amount of time after your shield drops before you can use it again (in ticks)
0 to 1200

durability.name: Durability
durability.information:
The maximum amount of times your shield can block an attack before it breaks
0 to 6000

default_model.name: Default Model
default_model.information: The CustomModelData value to use for the non-blocking model

blocking_model.name: Blocking Model
blocking_model.information: The CustomModelData to use for the blocking model

can_reflect_arrows.name: Can Reflect Arrows
can_reflect_arrows.information: If the shield can reflect arrows when blocking

bash_effect.name: Bash Effect ID
bash_effect.information:
The effect to run when you bash
The ID corresponds to a command in the "cushiled:event/bash_effect" function
0 for no effect

info2.name: Information #3
info2.information: How the shield interacts with disabler items.

info3.name: Information #4
info3.information: The type of block that this shield uses; either normal or parry.

disable_time.name: Disable Time
disable_time.information:
The amount of time the shield gets disabled when hit with a disabler item (in ticks)
defaults to 50

disable_resistant.name: Disable Resistant
disable_resistant.information: Weather this shield gets disabled when hit by a disabler item, if false, specify a time instead.

blocking_type.name: Blocking Type
blocking_type.information: Determines which type of blocking is used.

disable_resistant.name: Disable Resistant
disable_resistant.information: If false, specify a time instead

coyote_time.name: Coyote Time
coyote_time.information:
The amount of time after a player is hit that they can parry with this shield (in ticks)
recommended value of 2

block_value.name: Block Value
block_value.information:
The amount of damage this shield prevents from an attack
1 to 40

minimum_block_values.name: Persistence
minimum_block_values.information:
The amount of block value that remains by the end of the blocking time
High: No drop off
Medium: half of block value
Low: 0

minimum_block_value.name: Minimum Block Value
minimum_block_value.information:
The amount of damage that is blocked at minimum, a linear drop off from block value over the the entire block time
should be less than or equal to block value

block_player.name: Player Parry Effect
block_player.information:
The effect to apply to the player when successfully parrying
The ID corresponds to a command in the "cushiled:event/player_parry_effect" function
0 for no effect

entity_effect.name: Entity Parry Effect
entity_effect.information:
The effect to apply to the entity that was parried when successfully parrying
The ID corresponds to a command in the "cushiled:event/entity_parry_effect" function
0 for no effect

player_parry_effect.name: Player Parry Effect
player_parry_effect.information:
The effect to apply to the player when successfully parrying
The ID corresponds to a command in the "cushiled:event/player_parry_effect" function
0 for no effect

entity_parry_effect.name: Entity Parry Effect
entity_parry_effect.information:
The effect to apply to the entity that was parried when successfully parrying
The ID corresponds to a command in the "cushiled:event/entity_parry_effect" function
0 for no effect
